interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy and has over 22 officially recognized languages.
Japan has more than 6,800 islands and one of the highest life expectancies in the world.
France is the most visited country in the world by tourists.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, often called the lungs of the Earth.
Australia has more kangaroos than humans.
Canada has the longest coastline in the world.
Germany is known for having over 1,500 varieties of sausages.
The United States has no official national language.
Italy has more UNESCO World Heritage Sites than any other country.
